title: Bitcoin and mining ETF pathways diverge, reflecting shift in investor strategies
description:
Quick Take The correlation between Bitcoin and the Bitcoin mining ETF, WGMI, although strong through much of 2022 and 2023, has seen significant divergence since July 2023. Despite Bitcoin carving a year-to-date high north of $37,000, mining stocks represented by WGMI trailed, continuing to close lower. This suggests a paradigm shift in investor behavior. The […]

The post Bitcoin and mining ETF pathways diverge, reflecting shift in investor strategies appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: AB Bernstein Senior Analyst on NVIDIA Stock After Unveiling of a Sequel to the GPU OpenAI Used to Train GPT-4: ‘I Think You Have to Own It’
description: Yesterday, on CNBC’s “Closing Bell Overtime”, AB Bernstein analyst Stacy Rasgon provided an insightful analysis of NVIDIA’s current market position and its future in the AI chip industry. Rasgon highlighted NVIDIA’s significant lead over competitors and discussed the company’s valuation and investment potential. title: Aave Lending Markets Pick Up Operations After Security Concerns
description: Aave, the decentralized lending protocol, has successfully resumed its operations after facing security vulnerabilities earlier this month.

title: Bitcoin braces for 2024 halving, miners face major changes
description: The Bitcoin community braces for a significant shift as the next “halving” event, anticipated in April 2024, approaches. This event, critical in the cryptocurrency’s timeline, will see the rewards for Bitcoin mining slashed by half. The impact of this change is already stirring discussions and strategic moves among investors and miners. Currently, Bitcoin is nearing ... Read more

title: FTX token rises sharply on hopes of exchange’s rebirth
description: FTX Token has mysteriously pumped 176% this week as speculation swirls that the collapsed crypto exchange could relaunch under new owners.

title: FTX and Alameda transferred $24m in crypto Kraken and OKX

title: BTC Consolidates Below $37,000: Will Bitcoin Fall to $25,000 or Can the Bull Push it To $40,000?

title: YFI Whale Activity Reaches 15-Month High, Boosting Its Market Cap
description:
